node.text:
Watch as @lucia_silvestri takes you on a journey of color. In this video, the Bvlgari Creative Director invites you into the world of the Magnifica collection — giving you an exclusive look at some vibrant gemstones and dreamlike jewels.
.
.
Video by: @spkmore 
Music @guazzonemarco 
Cover by @monsieurtok 
Galleria images:
Director @tommaso.ottomano / DOP @mrcodepa / Production @studio.april 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Like a portal into a fantastical world, the architecture of the Eternal City gives our muses a gateway into a dreamlike Rome. Watch as @lilyaldridge, @zendaya, @vittoria, and @lalalalisa_m describe what it was like to peer into the wonder of Magnifica and create Bvlgari’s ethereal Brand Campaign film.
.
.
Director & photographer: @txemayeste
Starring #Lisa #Zendaya #LilyAldridge #VittoriaCeretti for Bvlgari
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #DreamMagnificence #LifeIsMagnificent

node.text:
In this brief look behind the scenes we take you from Italy’s capital to its fashion capital. Inside the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, watch as every second of the show is planned out and meticulously brought to life, celebrating the film’s true stars — the Magnifica High Jewelry collection. 
.
.
Production company @illmatic_film_group_company 
Executive producer @jacopo.pica 
Directed by @gooooooooooooooooooooofy
Producer @annaliasilecchia 
Photographer (cover) @gabrieldelachapelle 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry  #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.title: 'Magnifica' Opera d’Arte — From Rome to Milan.

node.text:
The vibrant inspiration of Rome returns to lift the hearts of the world. Shining into Italy’s fashion capital like a blinding ray of sunshine, Bvlgari presents its most exquisite High Jewelry collection to date. More than the launch of unparalleled works of jewelry craft, this is a resplendent celebration of rebirth. Honored through magnificent muses, music, and Milan, Bvlgari unveils the Magnifica High Jewelry collection at the heart of the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.
.
.
Models: @vittoria, @lilyaldridge @heconghc, @solangesmith and @blesnyaminher 
Special Guests: @andreabocelliofficial @beatricevenezi 
.
.
Project by @oma.eu
Director @tommaso.ottomano
DOP @mrcodepa
Stylist @sagliogeraldine (studio) @alicegentilucci (galleria)
Music @guazzonemarco 
Production @studio.april
. 
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Milan

node.text:
With two career GRAMMY nominations, seven studio albums, and nearly 3bn streams to his name, this live DJ set from @steveaoki promises to be spectacular. To celebrate the launch of the Bvlgari Aluminium Steve Aoki Special Edition watch, Bvlgari presents Steve Aoki live. Enjoy.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #SteveAoki #LiveConcert #SpecialGuestDJ

node.text:
In honor of the awards, @luxurylaw lays down the law on styling and jewelry for the Oscars. Known as the Image Architect, the fiercely talented super-stylist breaks down how he gets stars like @zendaya red carpet ready. This masterclass also gives you an up-close look at some stunning Bvlgari High Jewelry creations – including the exclusive Magnifica pieces Law used to create Zendaya’s jewelry story for this year's Academy Awards. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #93rdAcademyAwards #AcademyAwards #TheOscars #StarsInBvlgari

node.title: MASTERCLASS BY BVLGARI WITH LAW ROACH

node.text:
To our inspiration. To our incredible home. To the city of countless ancient adventures. To the city of the new stories yet to be lived and told. Celebrate the eternal city allure through the pages of “Bvlgari Roma: Travel Tales for Beauty Lovers” a one-of-a-kind guide to Rome’s renowned glamour.

Happy birthday Rome!

Directed by @oliverhl 
Aerial @snils @gianmarco.gabriele 
Music @federicoderoni 

#Bvlgari #Heritage #History #Roma #NataleDiRoma

node.text:
Unlocking the secrets of Serpenti.
The Bvlgari Watches Creative Director unravels the mystery of this breathtaking High Jewelry watch – the Serpenti Misteriosi Cleopatra. Listen as Fabrizio Buonamassa describes the intricacies of designing a watch within a pure High Jewelry piece, the sheer number of gemstones set into its hexagonal scales, and the unique way this intriguing Bvlgari creation fastens around the wrist. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #SerpentiMisteriosiCleopatra #ColorTreasures #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
A perfect synergy of creative energies.
Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, discusses working with internationally renowned architect, @tadao.ando. Together, they created a timepiece that harmonizes a Japanese expression of the nature of time with uniquely Italian codes of design.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #TadaoAndoLimitedSeries #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
With every record-breaking year, Bvlgari advances its expertise in the design and manufacture of Haute Horology timepieces. Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, shares his thoughts on the past triumphs of the Octo Finissimo collection – and what the new perpetual calendar means for the evolution of the saga.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on September 17, 2021. May be an image of saddle-stitched leather and purse.

node.text:
A forever icon. 
Bvlgari's Serpenti Cabochon is a seductive addition to every look. The tempting brass plated snakehead closure with its captivating black onyx eyes complements the exquisite soft quilted leather of this shoulder bag. Shop bold.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariAccessories #SerpentiCabochon #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on September 17, 2021.

node.text:
Visions of transcendence.
Bvlgari presents an awe-inspiring design for B.zero1. This pendant necklace defies the rules of jewelry design, built with striking black ceramic inserts and 18 kt rose gold. Dare to break convention and indulge in a groundbreaking creative vision. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.text:
Everlasting brilliance. 
B.zero1 is born from the mastery of the world’s most renowned amphitheater, the Colosseum. @blesnyaminher rejoices in these luxurious designs, built to transcend eras. Purchase the B.zero1 four-band ring in 18 kt rose gold online and in-store now. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

Go for Gold. 
Treasure your memories of summer with the B.zero1 18 kt rose gold bracelet. Its iconic spiral design a metaphor for the triumphant harmony of past, present, and future. Shop in-store and online now. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on September 15, 2021 tagging @daanroosegaarde.

node.text:
Rejuvenating the transcendental. 
During the first week of this month, Bvlgari’s “Metamorphosis” exhibition was inaugurated at Milan’s 2021 Design Week, showcasing work that reflects the principles found within the Maison’s constant design evolution. Two of the works came from artist @daanroosegaarde and architect @vincentvanduysen. Rosegaarde’s ‘Lotus Oculus’ is a living artwork made of hundreds of light-sensitive flowers, creating a connection between light and material. Van Duysen’s ‘Shelter’ highlights links between the simplicity of pure shapes, and the idea of richness and maximalism. 
.
.
Design Week art direction: @alba.cappellieri.
.
#Bvlgari #Serpenti #MilanDesignWeek2021 #GAM #Design #Milano

node.text:
The eternal cycle. 
The Maison’s "Metamorphosis" exhibition featured at Milan’s Gallery of Modern art at the beginning of this month and explored the contours of endless evolution and innovation. Each of the four international artists interpreted the theme of metamorphosis through their own creative languages in site-specific installations. The Bulgari Hotel of Milan also received a botanical sculpture from @azumamakoto for 2021’s Design Week, inspiring visitors to meditate on the process of growth.
.
.
Design Week art direction: @alba.cappellieri.
.
#Bvlgari #BulgariHotels #Bulgarihotelmilano #Serpenti #MilanDesignWeek2021 #GAM #Design #Milano

node.text:
Majestic metamorphosis. 
Take a look back at Bvlgari’s magnificent contribution to this year’s Milan Design Week, created under the artistic direction of @alba.cappellieri. Two artists who explored the stories and myths behind regeneration were @azumamakoto with his exquisite interpretation of a Garden of Eden, and @annveronicajanssens, whose installation ‘gam gam gam’ was based on the optical effect of reflection. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #Serpenti #MilanDesignWeek2021 #GAM #Design #Milano

node.text:
Magnificence at the Met. 
Bvlgari Brand Ambassador @Eizagonzalez wore an alluring blend of iconic Serpenti High Jewelry to this year’s Met Gala. The actress wore a stunning mix of diamonds and rubies, spread across an alluring yellow and gold Serpenti bracelet and vibrant High Jewelry earrings and ring. Actress @lesliegrace also attended the Gala in Bvlgari style. She fearlessly paired the Maison’s glamorous Divas’ Dream earrings with two matching rings and a Fiorever ring, all in an exquisite mix of white gold and diamond. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #Fiorever #MetGala2021 #StarsInBvlgari #MetGala

node.text:
Roman resplendence. 
This year’s Met Gala attendees @vittoria and @lilyaldridge were adorned with Bvlgari creations that are rooted in the Maison’s illustrious Roman history. Both wearing sublime pieces of Serpenti High Jewelry, the pair reveled in the sensual embrace of one of Bvlgari’s most enduring motifs. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #MetGala2021 #StarsInBvlgari #MetGala

node.text:
Shine bright like Rihanna. 
@badgalriri enjoyed the festivities at the 2021 Met Gala in an embodiment of Bvlgari grandeur in some of the Maison’s most elegant icons. She was gracefully adorned in a show-stopping collection of 267 carats of Bvlgari High Jewelry and archival diamonds. The singer boldly paired a High Jewelry necklace with a spectacular heritage necklace and two matching heritage bracelets along with a single High Jewelry earring. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #MetGala2021 #StarsInBvlgari #MetGala

node.text:
Dare to be bold. 
The BVLGARI BVLGARI watch is a symbol of perpetual reinvention, always striving for something greater. First launched 45 years ago, its modernistic nature has lent itself to uninhibited iconicity. @lalalalisa_m wears the Lady watch and prepares for valiant adventures. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariBvlgari #DreamAndDare

node.text:
Dream in color.
@lalalalisa_m aspires to phenomenal heights. These new B.zero1 creations reflect the collection’s visionary spirit. There is no boundary that can not be crossed in style by this relentless rule-breaker. 
.
.
.
